articles.title: Thousands Join Pro-Palestinian March Over Sydney Harbour Bridge
articles.description: Tens of thousands marched across the Sydney Harbour Bridge, demanding recognition of Palestinian statehood and sanctions on Israel. Despite severe weather, no injuries or arrests were reported.

articles.title: OPEC+ Agrees to a Big Output Increase
articles.description: The oil-producing alliance has approved a production hike of 547,000 barrels per day starting in September, reversing recent cuts aimed at regaining global market share amid geopolitical strain.

articles.title: China and Russia Begin Joint Military Drills in Sea of Japan
articles.description: China and Russia have commenced joint naval drills in the Sea of Japan to reinforce their partnership and counterbalance the U.S.-led global order. The exercises include submarine rescue and anti-missile operations.
